description: Numerators in the convergents of [L_1, L_2, L_3, . . . ] where L_i is period length of the continued fraction for sqrt(i).
example: The numerator of the 7th convergent of [0, 1, 2, 0, 1, 2, 4, 2, 0, 1, 2, 2, 5, 4, 2...] is 31.
author: Justin T. Miller (miller(AT)u.arizona.edu), Mar 02 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Mar 02 2000
